content: get ready to create the coziest chunky bear beanie with this beginner-friendly crochet pattern this adorable beanie is perfect for all ages from newborns to adults and is sure to keep you warm and stylish all winter long the pattern includes detailed instructions and a photo tutorial to guide you through the process making it a breeze even for beginners using super bulky lion brand hometown yarn and a 9mm crochet hook you ll work up this beanie in no time the chunky texture adds a touch of whimsy to the classic beanie design making it a fun and quick project for crafters of all skill levels **unique features-** suitable for all skill levels perfect for beginners available in a wide range of sizes from newborn to adult uses super bulky yarn for a quick and cozy finish features a chunky texture for added warmth and style includes detailed photo tutorial for easy crafting **materials needed-** \-yarn lion brand hometown super bulky 5-6 wpi - 70-81 yards hook 9mm us size 13 0 hook 9mm us size 13 0 gauges 4 stitches x 3 row = 2 inches in half_double_crochet 4 stitches by 3 row = 2 inches in half_double_crochet
